name: Steel Woole
description:
-This is a student project currently in development-

Plot: You assume the role of Steel Wool a robot that cleans any mess that appears in mechanoid city. It so happens that the Grease has emerged in mechanoid city and they are running a muck literally. Go clean them up and make that city sparkle.

Features

  • You can jump move and attack
  • Avoid or defeat the menace known as the grease
  • 3 scenic vistas that will break your mind
  • A tutorial that will make you an expert in 1 minute
  • Mechanics that are out of this world
